Name: Winter Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Reminiscent of an Apple Cart (a Calvados Sidecar), this is simple, balanced and tastes great.
Nutrition: One serving of Winter Cocktail contains 208 calories
